issue.title: [CF 1634] Any Help forums for TMW (looking for a Death Strike tracker)
issue.body:
Didn't know where else to post this, but is there a help forum for TellMeWhen? I'm looking for some assistance to create a Death Strike tracker (how much the next DS will heal for).


> Posted by CurseForge user barnabus1234 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1634 | Raw

comments.body:
There used to be, but Curse deleted it. You could try MMO Champion forums, or wow official forums.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
